articles.title: 2024 Writers Guild Awards Winners List (Updating Live) - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: 'American Fiction,' 'The Last of Us,' 'Beef,' 'Succession' and 'Poker Face' are among the winners so far. Follow along as this year's film and TV trophy recipients are announced in simultaneous ceremonies in New York and Los Angeles.
articles.content:
The 2024 Writers GuildAwards is taking place in simultaneous ceremonies in New York and Los Angeles.
The first award handed out in L.A. was for best adapted screenplay, which was given to the Oscars… [+19765 chars]

articles.author: Emilee Speck
articles.title: Major Plains, Midwest cities facing large hail, damaging wind, tornado threats early this week - Fox Weather
articles.description: Severe thunderstorms will fire off early this week across the Plains and Midwest, bringing the potential for baseball-sized hail, damaging wind gusts, tornadoes and heavy downpours across America's heartland.
